title: Tom Tugendhat – 2023 Speech at the PIER Annual Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Tom Tugendhat, the Security Minister, at Anglia Ruskin University on 23 May 2023.

It found quite simply appalling examples of organisations placing their own interests ahead of children’s safety: either by turning a blind eye or covering up the abuse.
